```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
ms_2011 <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openelections/openelections-data-ms/master/2011/20111108__ms__general__precinct.csv")

```


```{r}
bryant_yes <- ms_2011 %>%
  filter(office == 'Governor' | office == 'Measure No. 26 - Definition of a person') %>% 
  filter(candidate == 'Phil Bryant' | candidate == 'Yes') %>% 
  filter(precinct != 'TOTAL')
```


```{r}
bryant_yes_pivot <- bryant_yes %>% 
  select(county, precinct, candidate, votes) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = candidate, values_from = votes)

```
